ul.li: You can also enable syntax highlighting for inline code snippets. For this, you need to use the curly braces syntax ({{{ ... }}}). For example this {{{ lang=php function do_something($my_var) }}} will render like this: function do_something($my_var).

li.p: You can also specify the language by the file extension associated with the language. Simply use a dot followed by the file extension. For example, this will result in Ada highlighting: {{{ lang=.adb ... }}}.
